typedecl.typehead:
file_info() =
#file_info{size = undefined | integer() >= 0,
type = undefined
| device
| directory
| other
| regular
| symlink,
access = undefined
| read
| write
| read_write
| none,
atime = undefined
| file:date_time()
| integer() >= 0,
mtime = undefined
| file:date_time()
| integer() >= 0,
ctime = undefined
| file:date_time()
| integer() >= 0,
mode = undefined | integer() >= 0,
links = undefined | integer() >= 0,
major_device = undefined | integer() >= 0,
minor_device = undefined | integer() >= 0,
inode = undefined | integer() >= 0,
uid = undefined | integer() >= 0,
gid = undefined | integer() >= 0}

mode() = read
| write
| append
| exclusive
| raw
| binary
| {delayed_write,
Size :: integer() >= 0,
Delay :: integer() >= 0}
| delayed_write
| {read_ahead, Size :: integer() >= 1}
| read_ahead
| compressed
| {encoding, unicode:encoding()}
| sync

posix() = eacces
| eagain
| ebadf
| ebusy
| edquot
| eexist
| efault
| efbig
| eintr
| einval
| eio
| eisdir
| eloop
| emfile
| emlink
| enametoolong
| enfile
| enodev
| enoent
| enomem
| enospc
| enotblk
| enotdir
| enotsup
| enxio
| eperm
| epipe
| erofs
| espipe
| esrch
| estale
| exdev

posix_file_advise() = normal
| sequential
| random
| no_reuse
| will_need
| dont_need

clause.head: advise(IoDevice, Offset, Length, Advise) -> ok | {error, Reason}

subtype.string:
Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

clause.head:
path_open(Path, Filename, Modes) ->
{ok, IoDevice, FullName} | {error, Reason}

subtype.string:
Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

clause.head:
path_script(Path, Filename, Bindings) ->
{ok, Value, FullName} | {error, Reason}

subtype.string:
Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

clause.head:
pread(IoDevice, Location, Number) ->
{ok, Data} | eof | {error, Reason}

subtype.string:
Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| {no_translation, unicode, latin1}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| {no_translation, unicode, latin1}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}

Reason = posix()
| badarg
| terminated
| system_limit
| {Line :: integer(), Mod :: module(), Term :: term()}
